sir david não poupou críticas à política ambiental do presidente george w bush que se recusa a apoiar o protocolo de kyoto tratado para reduzir as emissões de dióxido de carbono que intensificam o efeito estufa	intensificam	 causam::0.17223361134529114	 aumentam::0.03254793956875801	 reduzem::0.030019357800483704	 podem::0.016933124512434006	 afetam::0.016544906422495842	 têm::0.0153633002191782	 envolvem::0.014830758795142174	 é::0.013432864099740982	 incluem::0.013147345744073391	 controlam::0.012822424061596394	 diminuem::0.012135581113398075	 reduz::0.011081992648541927	 influenciam::0.010706345550715923	 são::0.010267951525747776	 provocam::0.009266135282814503	 tem::0.00848442129790783	 sobre::0.007870789617300034	 representam::0.007372292689979076	 para::0.006822418887168169	 compõem::0.006780904717743397
quem não conseguir esgotar o armazenamento de diesel puro não pode misturar com o b2 porque o produto ficaria fora de especificação	esgotar	 fazer::0.10228337347507477	 utilizar::0.05703360587358475	 trocar::0.03982073441147804	 substituir::0.0388982892036438	 manter::0.036436885595321655	 usar::0.031736236065626144	 obter::0.024118613451719284	 realizar::0.01826244406402111	 com::0.01591518335044384	 ter::0.013042024336755276	 testar::0.012628424912691116	 comprar::0.012513336725533009	 retirar::0.011639532633125782	 reduzir::0.009847041219472885	 suportar::0.009110359475016594	 controlar::0.008896060287952423	 efetuar::0.008840848691761494	 receber::0.008796711452305317	 adquirir::0.007964648306369781	 administrar::0.007804879453033209
com capacidade para 283 presos abriga atualmente 541 condenados quase o dobro do previsto	atualmente	 1::0.3468526601791382	 2::0.22199881076812744	 3::0.07127628475427628	 6::0.0374981164932251	 4::0.03181064501404762	 5::0.027013827115297318	 7::0.01799728348851204	 9::0.014064288698136806	 aproximadamente::0.01109051238745451	 quase::0.009441164322197437	 12::0.009426768869161606	 8::0.008992341347038746	 11::0.007408645935356617	 10::0.0057825506664812565	 14::0.00486820749938488	 r::0.004704050719738007	 17::0.004360637627542019	 22::0.004027027636766434	 18::0.003988136071711779	 21::0.003925107419490814
